overview: Luccke is a vivacious, cross-dressing gay male that embraces his sexuality after being physically abused and rejected by his family. While living in his truth as an author, the secrets in his novel, "It Ain't Easy Being a Hoe," begins to haunt him, after he divulges the personal information of his friends. The Hoe Squad Elite knows how to "use what they got to get what they want." They evolve through heartbreak, mental illness, rejection, and violence to triumph into millionaires and true friendship prevails.
tagline: It Ain't Easy being a Hoe
title: Luccke
